channel.title: Missing thousand / million units from number when Query Result from Google Sheet
channel.description:
I imported a data source from Google Sheet. Everything worked fine!
But when I tried to query result from google sheet, the number behaved weirdly. I want to divide a column with a specific number however:
1,000,000 suddenly became 1. 108,000 suddenly became 108 in my calculation.
Could any one help please. Thanks

item.title: Missing thousand / million units from number when Query Result from Google Sheet
item.dc:creator: eddiethinhvuong
item.description:
I imported a data source from Google Sheet. Everything worked fine!

But when I tried to query result from google sheet, the number behaved weirdly.
I want to divide a column with a specific number however:

1,000,000 suddenly became 1.
108,000 suddenly became 108
in my calculation.

Could any one help please. Thanks
